1165630.name: flyingshapes° Professional 1 Year Special
1165630.description:
flyingshapes° Professional for 1 Month

SHAPE YOUR VISIONS


Get up to speed with a truly native VR workflow for 3D modeling.

  • Immerse yourself in a native VR environment to streamline your design process
  • Enjoy precise spline modeling with advanced curvature features
  • Export and import industry-grade file formats like STL, STEP, IGES
  • Ensure full commercial use of your files without limitations or watermarks

What will I get after the purchase?


flyingshapes° Professional is a 3D surface modeling software native to VR. It includes advanced features specifically developed for digital designers in the fields of product design, architecture and the automobile industry.

Your license starts immediately after the purchase. You will be able to update the software and benefit from all new features introduced during one month.

What happens after 1 month?


After 1 month your discounted subscription will automatically continue as a regular subscription, unless cancelled.
